text: xallxhˌ di thrng prathan kha klaw thi di ying lng ma pen khamphir khlxngcxng kan klaw sa kan phiwhnang khxng brrda phu thi kerng klaw phracea khxng phwk khea ca luk chan khun læw phiwhnang khxng phwk khea læa hawcı khxng phwk khea ca sngb lng pheux ra luk thung xallxhˌ nan khux kar china thang khx ngxallxhˌ phraxngkh ca thrng china thang kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa phu dı thi xallxhˌ thrng hı khea hlng thang dangnan sahrab khea ca mimi phu china thang
